about_the_game:
Note: Gulf Echoes is a Co-op only game, two players require their own copy of the game. The game also relies on communicating with each other.

Delve into the tale set in the Arabian gulf region. A cooperative puzzle adventure that traverses the threads of time. Play with a partner to navigate two intertwining times.

You and your partner must choose between two paths. Each one of you will choose a separate path and explore the game from a different perspective.



Your journey begins in a secluded desert tent, where betrayal casts a shadow on age-old friendships. As you unravel this treacherous plot, you and your partner will travel through time, encountering puzzles more complex than before.
Guided by the echoes of the past and the deep richness of the Gulf culture, players must share vital clues from their individual timelines to solve intricate puzzles. Experience a symphony of narrative and strategy.



Discover hidden truths, forge new pathways, and piece together fragments of memories as you embark on this mesmerizing journey. In Gulf Echoes, the past is not a distant shore but a living, breathing realm awaiting your exploration.

name: Gulf Echoes: Memories of the past

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1+
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities
  • DirectX: Version 10
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Embark on a co-op puzzle journey rooted in the Arab gulf region. Grab a friend and unravel tales from the past. You and your partner must bridge time, sharing clues to unveil hidden truths. Solve intricate puzzles from the present to the past.
